thread.title: Hot Mic Catches Biden Saying Post-White House Plans Will Focus On ‘Cancer Moonshot’
thread.title_full: Hot Mic Catches Biden Saying Post-White House Plans Will Focus On ‘Cancer Moonshot’

author: Jack Davis
title: Hot Mic Catches Biden Saying Post-White House Plans Will Focus On ‘Cancer Moonshot’
text:
Biden Leaves Open Possibility Of 2020 Presidential Bid 
As part of its work, the moonshot is trying to match cancer centers with private investment and philanthropy. It is also seeking to use advances in data gathering and analysis to better inform research. 
— The Cancer Letter (@TheCancerLetter) December 22, 2016 
On Tuesday, after the ceremony to swear in the new Senate, Biden said he planned “to continue the cancer work” through “the Biden Trust,” according to a video from C-SPAN . Advertisement - story continues below 
“It’s not so much about raising money or philanthropy, though there will be some of that, but it’s more about keeping these guys cooperating and changing the culture,” Biden said. 
In response to a question, the vice president replied, “I’m going to be based out of Penn for foreign policy” and added he was “deliberately not associating with any one medical center.” 
As part of the Cures Act, the moonshot received $300 million in the second fiscal 2017 continuing resolution, The Cancer Letter reported. 
Biden has said he is able to do what others cannot. Advertisement - story continues below
